Package controller

Class ControllerUtils

java.lang.Object
controller.ControllerUtils
public final class ControllerUtils extends Object
It's a utility class that contains methods that are used by multiple controllers.

    • buildWindowNodes

      public void buildWindowNodes(javafx.event.Event event, javafx.fxml.FXMLLoader loader) throws IOException
      It takes an event and an FXMLLoader, and it creates a new window with the FXMLLoader's root as the scene.
      Parameters:
      event - The event that triggered the method.
      loader - The FXMLLoader object that is used to load the FXML file.
      Throws:
      IOException - The standard exception when loading a fxml file.
